name: BarrelFall
description:
In 1901, a woman named Annie Taylor was the first person to conquer the falls in a barrel and Now you can do the same! 

Fall off a waterfall and dodge rocks that will kill you if you get hit them. You also don't have much air so you must collect air before you die but when you do, you won't be able to move until you finish collecting air.

HOW TO PLAY:

Use the A D or arrow keys to move left and right so you can dodge rocks that in the way. Use the space bar to collect air but remember that when you do you won't be able to move around until you stop collecting air.

This game was made by Blockhead manic, everything to the art, and to the programming.

Blockhead Manic - itch.io

The music was made by Buyana114 Buyana114 - itch.io

I hope you enjoy this mini game that I made for the Mini Jam #104!

Mini Jam 104: Cascade - itch.io

I also have a youtube channel!
